public-ip
*********


Description
===========

A *public IP* is a conceptual term that refers to a public IP address
and related properties. The *publicIp* object is the API
representation of a public IP.

There are two types of public IPs: 1. Ephemeral 2. Reserved

For more information and comparison of the two types, see Public IP
Addresses.


Available Commands
==================

* change-compartment

* create

* delete

* get

* list

* update
